verses.verse: I will lift up<WH5375> my eyes<WH5869> to the hills.<WH2022> Where<WH370> does my help<WH5828> come from?<WH935>
My help<WH5828> comes from Yahweh,<WH3068> who made<WH6213> heaven<WH8064> and earth.<WH776>
He will not allow<WH5414> your foot<WH7272> to be moved.<WH4132> He who keeps<WH8104> you will not slumber.<WH5123>
Behold,<WH8104> he who keeps Israel<WH3478> will neither slumber<WH5123> nor sleep.<WH3462>
Yahweh<WH3068> is your keeper.<WH8104> Yahweh<WH3068> is your shade<WH6738> on your right<WH3225> hand.<WH3027>
The sun<WH8121> will not harm<WH5221> you by day,<WH3119> nor the moon<WH3394> by night.<WH3915>
Yahweh<WH3068> will keep<WH8104> you from all evil.<WH7451> He will keep<WH8104> your soul.<WH5315>
Yahweh<WH3068> will keep<WH8104> your going out<WH3318> and your coming in,<WH935> from this time forth,<WH5704> and forevermore.<WH5769>
